comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
Damn.  I could live off the government titty for 6 months if they did that in PA.
Do weed next then.
The United States desperately need a governmental rework
Republicans are now for giving welfare to people who don’t work as long as they spread a disease
Entitlements! Boot straps! And so on
But they can still fire me for refusing to unzip my pants and pee into a bottle.  Freedom!
I guess using the tax dollars of Capitalism to give welfare to those who choose to quit their jobs is only called Socialism if its a democrat freebie.
So...making these people even less likely to get vaccinated.  Blood is on his hands, i wonder how many will die from this decision.
So communism is fine?
Um..  yes please
BuT ThAtS SoCiAlIsM 😵‍💫😵‍💫😵‍💫
So fire them for insubordination or some other bullshit
shouldn't unemployment apply to everyone who is unemployed, which ppl fired for not being vaccinated is apart of? weird ass law

Wait, wait… maybe we can get all the antivaxxers to move to Iowa. Then we can all just avoid going there (shouldn’t be hard, most of us do that anyway), and we’ll solve almost every problem in the country in one go. 

Hospital overcrowding? Not an issue outside of Iowa. 

Too many underpopulated red states clogging the senate with over representation? Now it’s just Iowa. 

Nazi salutes at a school board meeting? Well, that’s Iowa for you. 

I’m seeing a win here for everyone except the people who choose to live in Iowa. And have we ever really cared about them?
That will go well with her constituents.
Republican short circuits. Will wake up tomorrow calling the unemployed lazy shits and cancel the benefit.
Oh no! Now no one will want to work anymore! /s
Psh. They need to get a job. McDonalds is hiring.
The twist is they have to have a covid vax to get the unemployment money.. .. well no but that'd be pretty funny
Good. These people are idiots but they don’t deserve to starve or go homeless.
The alternative situation is stupid as well. How about we not fire people during labour shortages while the pandemic appears to be winding down.
Why would these people want to go back to work now.  They are getting paid to not work.

I was really thinking of moving back home to Iowa from Texas but me thinks I'll find something over on the other side of the stream in Ill. Reynolds is really starting to piss me off.  Not on Abbott level yet but she is trying.
[removed]
Do they expire like normal unemployment benefits, thus leaving them in the same boat anyway?
Whats the purpose of the republican party again?
Ok. Can we show the same level of understanding to people addicted to drugs?
Welfare for antivaxxers
Giving government handouts to lazy people who don’t want to work.
This is even worse knowing that Reynolds cut federal UI covid benefits early and claimed they made Iowans too lazy to take any of the jobs no one wants.
They'll cut something like food stamps from people in real need to help their fellow antivaxxer. Only in America.
... unless they're vulnerable workers at pork processing plants.
Meanwhile the labor situation worsens. Stop rewarding stupidity.
Talk about dirty commies!
LOL it's not communism when WE do it.
